text: Ara yakhana tadera kache nirapattara athaba bhayera kono bisaya ase, tara ta chariye deya. Ara yadi tara ta rasulera o tadera madhyekara kartrpaksera gocare anato tabe tamdera madhyera yamdera e tadanta karara katha tamra ta janate paratena.
